comment._content: This photograph is featured in the Indicommons.org post Who are these women? (with special thanks to Penny).

comment.author: 51132972@N05
comment._content: my parents bought a beach house in avalon nj in 1973... down the shore. the house was owned by the late hester rawley. she was very old and they bought the house from her estate. we found many references, including love letters and a stetson hat that had the name john wanamaker on them. we speculated that she was the girl friend. sound riight?
